data.text: ……Haaa.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Haaa.

data.text:
(The more and more I think about it, the more it 
seems like I don't know anything about Trainer-san)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(The more and more I think about it, the more it 
<story>seems like I don't know anything about Trainer-san)

data.text: 『I didn't think you'd just head home』
data.processed: <story>『I didn't think you'd just head home』

data.text: 『Since you don't like to give up, Rob Roy』
data.processed: <story>『Since you don't like to give up, Rob Roy』

data.text: 『Since you don't like to give up, Rob Roy』
data.processed: <story>『Since you don't like to give up, Rob Roy』

data.text: 『Rob Roy. What's your dream?』
data.processed: <story>『Rob Roy. What's your dream?』

data.text: 『Rob Roy. What's your dream?』
data.processed: <story>『Rob Roy. What's your dream?』

data.text:
Trainer-san understands me…… they're trying 
to understand me…… but I'm only thinking about myself.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san understands me…… they're trying 
<story>to understand me…… but I'm only thinking about myself.

data.text: Even though I'm the one with a hero's name……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Even though I'm the one with a hero's name……

data.text:
……Ah. T-this won't do. Instead of thinking about 
something like this, I should do something more productive……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……Ah. T-this won't do. Instead of thinking about 
<story>something like this, I should do something more productive……!

data.text:
(Right, I want to know more about Trainer-san. Rather than 
just imagining it, I want to know the real Trainer-san……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Right, I want to know more about Trainer-san. Rather than 
<story>just imagining it, I want to know the real Trainer-san……)

data.text:
(But even if I say that, just asking them 『Tell me 
more about yourself』 feels weird…… and embarrassing)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(But even if I say that, just asking them 『Tell me 
<story>more about yourself』 feels weird…… and embarrassing)

data.text:
Hyaah!? Ah, eh, ah, T-Trainer-san……! G-good afternoon. 
Umm…… what a coincidence, are you on a walk?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I was thinking of doing some shopping
choices.processed: <size=43>I was thinking of doing some shopping</size>

data.processed:
<story>Hyaah!? Ah, eh, ah, T-Trainer-san……! G-good afternoon. 
<story>Umm…… what a coincidence, are you on a walk?

data.text:
(! C-could this be!? A chance 
to learn more about Trainer-san……!?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(! C-could this be!? A chance 
<story>to learn more about Trainer-san……!?)

data.text:
……M-me too. So, um…… if it's okay, 
c-could…… could I go together with you!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……M-me too. So, um…… if it's okay, 
<story>c-could…… could I go together with you!?

data.text:
As expected, this bookstore's selection of books 
is great because it's really big……! There's lots 
of new releases and they keep a good stock――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>As expected, this bookstore's selection of books 
<story>is great because it's really big……! There's lots 
<story>of new releases and they keep a good stock――

data.text:
Huh? Where's Trainer-san……!? 
Oh no, I was so distracted by the books――……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Huh? Where's Trainer-san……!? 
<story>Oh no, I was so distracted by the books――……?

data.text:
I had a hard time figuring out what to do. 
Really, thank you very much!
data.name: Unfamiliar Man
data.processed:
<story>I had a hard time figuring out what to do. 
<story>Really, thank you very much!

data.text:
In that case, let's confirm it one more time. 
So it's that escalator over there――
data.name: Unfamiliar Man
data.processed:
<story>In that case, let's confirm it one more time. 
<story>So it's that escalator over there――

data.text:
(……maybe they needed directions? Trying to find a certain shop? 
And when they needed help, Trainer-san stepped in……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(……maybe they needed directions? Trying to find a certain shop? 
<story>And when they needed help, Trainer-san stepped in……)

data.text:
(Yeah, yeah. That other person seems relieved. 
I get it, since Trainer-san is easy to talk to!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Yeah, yeah. That other person seems relieved. 
<story>I get it, since Trainer-san is easy to talk to!)

data.text:
(Considerate, and kind…… Ehehe. 
So Trainer-san really is the kind of person I thought they were)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Considerate, and kind…… Ehehe. 
<story>So Trainer-san really is the kind of person I thought they were)

data.text:
Sorry about earlier. 
We got separated at the book store……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Sorry about earlier. 
<story>We got separated at the book store……

data.text:
……Trainer-san, you read books pretty often, don't you? 
You had those really thick books sitting on your desk.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……Trainer-san, you read books pretty often, don't you? 
<story>You had those really thick books sitting on your desk.

data.text:
I've always thought it but, it seems like 
you're doing a lot of studying, and working hard.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I've always thought it but, it seems like 
<story>you're doing a lot of studying, and working hard.

data.text:
I tried remembering what was on my desk that would 
make Zenno Rob Roy say that. It's true there were 
some books with covers on them. Those were――
data.processed:
<story>I tried remembering what was on my desk that would 
<story>make Zenno Rob Roy say that. It's true there were 
<story>some books with covers on them. Those were――

data.text: Eh, manga? Not technical manuals?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Eh, manga? Not technical manuals?

data.text:
……s-so that's what they were! I read a lot of manga too. 
Next time, tell me what those manga are about, okay!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……s-so that's what they were! I read a lot of manga too. 
<story>Next time, tell me what those manga are about, okay!?

data.text:
Um…… t-that's right. 
Earlier, that guy was talking to you, right?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Um…… t-that's right. 
<story>Earlier, that guy was talking to you, right?

data.text:
Was he asking you where a shop was? 
Trainer-san is kind so you're easy to talk to――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Oh, you mean that gym promoter?

data.processed:
<story>Was he asking you where a shop was? 
<story>Trainer-san is kind so you're easy to talk to――

data.text: G-gym promoter?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>G-gym promoter?

data.text:
He told me that even though he had talked to 
a lot of people, none of them had even visited.

choices.text: He gave me a coupon for a free trial

data.processed:
<story>He told me that even though he had talked to 
<story>a lot of people, none of them had even visited.

data.text:
Oh…… Ohhh……! That's nice, 
it feels good to be able to move your body, after all!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Oh…… Ohhh……! That's nice, 
<story>it feels good to be able to move your body, after all!

data.text:
(Aaah, I've done it now! To keep talking like that 
without confirming things first…… is rude isn't it?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Aaah, I've done it now! To keep talking like that 
<story>without confirming things first…… is rude isn't it?)

data.text:
(But, it's true that Trainer-san is 
always working hard and is kind……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(But, it's true that Trainer-san is 
<story>always working hard and is kind……)

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>（……But……）

data.text:
…………Sorry, about various things. 
Speaking so enthusiastically like that……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>…………Sorry, about various things. 
<story>Speaking so enthusiastically like that……

data.text:
Enthusiastically…… she probably means…… about 
thinking those manga were technical manuals, 
and thinking I was giving directions.
data.processed:
<story>Enthusiastically…… she probably means…… about 
<story>thinking those manga were technical manuals, 
<story>and thinking I was giving directions.

data.text:
A hard-working, kind person. 
It was a misunderstanding because she saw me that way――
data.processed:
<story>A hard-working, kind person. 
<story>It was a misunderstanding because she saw me that way――

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: I'll work hard to be like that

data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text: Trainer-san……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san……

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy seemed a little down but, 
I didn't think she needed to worry.
data.processed:
<story>Zenno Rob Roy seemed a little down but, 
<story>I didn't think she needed to worry.

data.text:
If that's what being a 『Trainer』 meant to her, 
then I'd make that my goal.
data.processed:
<story>If that's what being a 『Trainer』 meant to her, 
<story>then I'd make that my goal.

data.text: And if someday, I could become like that――

choices.text: I want to live up to that

data.processed: <story>And if someday, I could become like that――

data.text: ……! Trainer-san……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……! Trainer-san……

data.text: (So that's what they were thinking……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(So that's what they were thinking……)

data.text:
(As I thought, Trainer-san is kind. 
……But)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(As I thought, Trainer-san is kind. 
<story>……But)

data.text:
(Right now, about Trainer-san…… 
doesn't that mean I'm pushing my ideals on them……?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Right now, about Trainer-san…… 
<story>doesn't that mean I'm pushing my ideals on them……?)

data.text:
(I'm happy they're thinking about me. 
The kindness of trying to become my ideal…… is heart-warming)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I'm happy they're thinking about me. 
<story>The kindness of trying to become my ideal…… is heart-warming)

data.text:
(But…… living up to my one-sided ideals. 
I don't want Trainer-san to feel forced in to it)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(But…… living up to my one-sided ideals. 
<story>I don't want Trainer-san to feel forced in to it)

data.text:
While gazing at the sunset, I feel that I want 
to do my best to get closer to that ideal――
data.processed:
<story>While gazing at the sunset, I feel that I want 
<story>to do my best to get closer to that ideal――

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy seemed to be troubled with complex emotions 
as she gazed down at the orange-tinted asphalt.
data.processed:
<story>Zenno Rob Roy seemed to be troubled with complex emotions 
<story>as she gazed down at the orange-tinted asphalt.

title: I Don't Want To Force You
